title: Britain’s economy will soon be overtaken by Lithuania unless we act now
description:
Jacob King/PA Wire

Who said these words just over two years ago? “It is no use simply claiming we want economic growth without new ideas for how we can achieve it.”

title: EU ministers court Trump on joint China policy, even as public scepticism grows
description:
As they look to keep the United States engaged in Ukraine and push for lower trade tariffs, EU ministers lobbied their US counterparts for joint policies on China on Monday - even as new public opinion polling shows a waning appetite for such a partnership.

The China carrot was dangled by successiv...
